title: Wispr Flow
description: Wispr Flow is a voice-powered dictation tool that helps you write 3x faster across all your apps. Speak naturally, and Wispr Flow transforms your voice into perfectly formatted text with real-time auto-edits, tone matching, and support for over 100 languages. Whether you’re writing emails, reports, or coding, Wispr Flow saves time and eliminates manual edits. Unlock seamless productivity and streamline your workflow—effortlessly and accurately.
